title: Personal hygiene for women. Part 2
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hygiene
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Ephemeral films
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women - Health and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental hygiene - United States
description: Describes the hygienic measures necessary to prevent the spread of contagious diseases. Shows in an experiment how a cold may be spread. Points out the prevalence of venereal disease, and explains the cause, symptoms, cure, and prevention of syphilis, gonorrhoea, and chancroid.
